David Heinemeier Hansson: A state of sunshine

stories.text:
After more than a year of developing and iterating on a group of designers, we eventually started in an invite only launch beginning of the year.

Our challenge: Traditional design tools like Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop and co. are too complex and take a long time to learn. Other options like Canva are too basic for creators.

Our approach: Kittl is bridging this gap - empowering everyone to create stunning designs, without experience in graphic design or additional tools.

We are a small group of people that actually got to know each other here on HN. It would be great to hear your feedback: https://www.producthunt.com/posts/kittl

Thanks and happy to chat about it.
